long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the legendary Storm King to your browser with the Storm King Fortnite Live Wallpaper extension. Witness the awe-inspiring presence of this iconic boss as it dominates your screen with dynamic stormy visuals. Enjoy a smooth, secure, and fast browsing experience while immersing yourself in Fortnite’s epic battle energy.

Features:
⚡ Storm King live wallpaper with intense and immersive storm effects
🌐 Quick access to your favorite website shortcuts
🔍 Search bar customizable to your preferred engine
📂 Developer info and simple removal options
Let the Storm King command your new tabs. Download now and conquer the storm in Fortnite style! 🌪️👑
